name: conversations.requestSharedInvite.deny
desc: Denies a request to invite an external user to a channel

invite_id.desc: ID of the requested shared channel invite to deny.

message.desc: Optional message explaining why the request to invite was denied.

errors.invite_not_found: We couldn't find a Slack Connect channel invite with the ID provided.
errors.user_not_found: We could not find the user who made the invite request.
errors.team_not_found: We could not find the team which made the invite request.
errors.channel_not_found: We could not find the channel where the request was made.
errors.restricted_action: A team preference prevents the invite from being denied.
errors.message_too_long: If the passed in deny message is greater than 560 characters.
